thread.title: Bar Louie Launches Breast Cancer Awareness Fundraiser
thread.title_full: Bar Louie Launches Breast Cancer Awareness Fundraiser - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Bar Louie Launches Breast Cancer Awareness Fundraiser
text:
Bar Louie
ADDISON, Texas , Oct. 1, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bar Louie announced today their month long breast cancer research campaign called Eat. Drink.Think Pink. As part of the campaign Bar Louie designed a specialty pink martini called the "Think Pink." During the entire month of October, Bar Louie will donate $1 from every "Think Pink" martini sold to breast cancer research.
"This is the 8 th year we've joined the breast cancer awareness movement during the month of October. From local events to national fundraisers, we are passionate about helping find a cure for breast cancer," says Bar Louie CMO, Dan Drummond .
The "Think Pink" drink is a delicious handcrafted martini featuring Deep Eddy Lemon, St. Germain, Cranberry Juice and fresh squeezed lime. It will only be available during the month of October.
"We believe that Guests are going to love the Think Pink martini and the opportunity to support a great cause," says Drummond.
Founded in downtown Chicago in 1990, Bar Louie is a bar and eatery with a casual, social atmosphere. Known for their handcrafted signature martinis, they also feature an exceptional selection of appetizers, flatbreads, salads, burgers and sandwiches. While beer and wine lovers will be impressed with the extensive selection of imports, beers on tap and 20 wines by the glass, cocktail drinkers will revel in the 34 signature martinis, mojitos and margaritas made from premium liquors, fresh fruit and hand squeezed juices.
Bar Louie is open daily for lunch, dinner and late night dining from 11 a.m. to 2 a.m. Monday through Sunday with the entire menu available until last call. For other Bar Louie locations or information on franchising opportunities visit barlouie.com. Eat. Drink. Think Pink.
